hero.tagline: NFC-powered outdoor adventure games for scouting organizations. Create missions, place bases, and let teams explore the real world.

howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Three steps to adventure
howItWorks.step1Body: Place bases on an interactive map, write NFC tags, create challenges, and assemble teams through the web admin panel.
howItWorks.step2Body: Teams head into the field with their phones, scan NFC tags at physical bases, and unlock challenges to solve on the spot.
howItWorks.step3Body: Watch the action unfold on the live dashboard with team tracking, leaderboards, activity feeds, and submission review.

features.label: Features
features.title: Everything you need to run the game
features.nfcBody: Scan physical NFC tags placed at bases throughout the playing field to check in and unlock challenges. Each tag is uniquely linked to a base location for tamper-proof verification.
features.mapsBody: GPS-tracked bases and live team locations displayed on an interactive map with real-time status indicators.
features.challengesBody: Multiple answer types including free-text with auto-validation and photo submissions for manual review.
features.leaderboardBody: Live team rankings updated instantly as challenges are completed and points are awarded.
features.dashboardBody: Monitor every aspect of your game in real-time: active teams, pending submissions, completion rates, and team progress.
features.pushBody: Send instant messages to all teams or specific teams directly in the field.
features.offlineBody: Submissions queue offline and sync automatically when connectivity returns.
features.multiLangBody: Available in English, Portuguese, and German with automatic language detection.
